channel.title: Right click ID
channel.description: I need client with right click id. Like I right click on Tree and I will see (ObjectID,coords) Sorry for english , Im russian.

item.title: Right click ID
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

     buildInterfaceMenu(); //Named

This contains the Context Build for what you’re looking for. Here’s a rough example of doing this for Inventory Items referenced within this Method:

     if(Called_Class == DefItem) {
          contextString[DefName] = "Use " + ItemDefName + " Item with: " + DefItem.Yours;
     }

Props for posting in the correct section.

Read full topic
